sentences.sContent: I have a volleyball , But he one.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have a volleyball , But he one.
sentences.sCn: 我没有排球，但他有一个。

sentences.sContent: After that, I played volleyball with my friends.
sentences.sContent_eng: After that, I played volleyball with my friends.
sentences.sCn: 在此之后，我打排球和我的朋友。

trans.tranOther: a game in which two teams use their hands to hit a ball over a high net
